title: Shibli felicitates China on national day
content:
ISLAMABAD, Oct 01 (APP): Minister for Information and Broadcasting Senator Shibli Faraz Thursday felicitated China on its 71st National Day.
In a tweet on social media platform Twitter, he said, “China is the cornerstone of our foreign policy and is an all weather friend.”
“Our relationship has strengthened on a constant basis, ” he added.
